i.name: Determination
i.description: Every third attack deals bonus damage and heals Xin Zhao.

q.name: Three Talon Strike
q.description: Xin Zhao's next 3 standard attacks deal increased damage with the third attack knocking an opponent into the air.

w.name: Wind Becomes Lightning
w.description: Xin Zhao slashes in front of himself with his spear, then thrusts it forward, slowing affected enemies.

e.name: Audacious Charge
e.description: Xin Zhao charges to an enemy, dealing damage to all enemies in the area and slowing them briefly.

r.name: Crescent Guard
r.description: Xin Zhao deals damage to nearby enemies based on their current Health and knocks non-challenged targets back. Xin Zhao is impervious to damage dealt by champions outside of the circle created.

i1.blurb: Every third attack deals bonus damage and heals Xin Zhao.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Every third basic attack or {{ai|Wind Becomes Lightning|Xin Zhao}} strike deals {{as|{{pp|4|key=%|15 to 45|1 to 16|displayformula=15%+10% every 5 levels}} AD}} {{tip|physical damage|{{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}}} and {{tip|heal|restores}} {{sti|health|{{pp|8 to 59|color=health}} {{as|(+ 10% AD)}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}} {{as|health}}}}.
i1.name: Determination
notes: * Hitting one or more enemies with {{ai|Wind Becomes Lightning|Xin Zhao}} applies one stack per strike. The bonus damage applies to all enemies of one strike, but the healing only once.

riot.name: Determination
riot.description: Every third attack deals bonus damage and heals Xin Zhao.

riot.name: Three Talon Strike
riot.description: Xin Zhao's next 3 standard attacks deal increased damage with the third attack knocking an opponent into the air.
riot.tooltip: Xin Zhao's next 3 basic attacks deal {{ e1 }} <scaleAD>(+{{ f1 }})</scaleAD> extra physical damage and reduce his other cooldowns by 1 second. The final strike also knocks the target into the air for {{ e2 }} seconds.

q1.blurb: Xin Zhao's next 3 standard attacks deal increased damage with the third attack knocking an opponent into the air.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} For the next 5 seconds, '''Xin Zhao's''' next 3 basic attacks each deal {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} and reduce his other [[Champion ability|ability]] {{sti|cooldown|cooldowns}} by 1 second each.
Each ''Talon Strike'' can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} for {{as|100% {{critical damage|100|melee}} '''bonus''' physical damage}}.
The third basic attack {{tip|airborne|knocks up}} the target for {{fd|0.75}} seconds.
''Three Talon Strike'' resets '''Xin Zhao's''' basic attack timer.
leveling: {{st|Bonus Physical Damage|{{ap|20 to 40}} {{as|(+ 40% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Total Bonus Damage|{{ap|20*3 to 40*3}} {{as|(+ 120% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
q1.name: Three Talon Strike
notes: * ''Three Talon Strike'' has no cast time and does not interrupt ''Xin Zhao's'' previous orders.
* ''Three Talon Strike's'' cooldown will begin only after the duration ends or the third enhanced attack is consumed.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block only one empowered attack as well as the knockup.
* {{sbc|Possible Bug:}} The enhanced attacks present input buffering during their wind-up animation (they cannot be canceled and ''Xin Zhao'' cannot be issued any commands until after it ends).

riot.name: Wind Becomes Lightning
riot.description: Xin Zhao slashes in front of himself with his spear, then thrusts it forward, slowing affected enemies.
riot.tooltip:
Xin Zhao slashes in front of himself with his spear, then thrusts it forward.

Slash: {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage.
Thrust: {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) damage and slows by {{ e6 }}% for {{ e7 }} seconds.

Cast time is reduced with Attack Speed provided from items and levels (minimum of 0.4 seconds). Current cast time: {{ f5 }}

Deals 50% less damage to minions.
Lifesteal is 33% effective on both attacks.
Extends the current duration of Xin Zhao's other abilities by {{ f5 }} seconds.

w1.blurb: Xin Zhao slashes in front of himself with his spear, then thrusts it forward.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Xin Zhao''' performs two strikes over {{as|{{pp|type='''bonus''' attack speed|2|0.5;0.4|key1=%|0;140.5|displayformula=0.5-0.1 per 140.5% '''bonus''' attack speed. }}|attack speed}} seconds.
The first deals {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies in an arc, and the second deals {{as|physical damage}} in a line, {{tip|slow|slowing}} all enemies hit by 50% for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
Both strikes deal 50% damage against [[minion]]s, benefit from {{fd|33.{{recurring|3}}}}% of '''Xin Zhao's''' {{stil|life steal}} and the duration of his other abilities is paused during the effect.
leveling: {{st|Slash Damage|{{ap|30 to 70}} {{as|(+ 30% AD)}}|Thrust Damage|{{ap|30 to 170}} {{as|(+ 75% AD)}}|Max. Physical Damage|{{ap|30+30 to 70+170}} {{as|(+ 105% AD)}}}}

{{st|Slash Minion-Damage|{{ap|30/2 to 70/2}} {{as|(+ 15% AD)}}|Thrust Minion-Damage|{{ap|30/2 to 170/2}} {{as|(+ {{fd|37.5}}% AD)}}|Max. Minion-Damage|{{ap|(30+30)/2 to (70+170)/2}} {{as|(+ {{fd|52.5}}% AD)}}}}
w1.name: Wind Becomes Lightning
notes: * {{tip|Spell shield}} will block only a single instance of damage - either the thrust or the slash.

riot.name: Audacious Charge
riot.description: Xin Zhao charges to an enemy, dealing damage to all enemies in the area and slowing them briefly.
riot.tooltip: Xin Zhao charges to an enemy. The charge deals {{ e1 }}<scaleAP> (+{{ a1 }})</scaleAP> magic damage to nearby enemies and slows them by {{ e2 }}% for 0.5 seconds.  Charging grants Xin Zhao {{ e3 }}% attack speed for {{ e4 }} seconds.

e1.blurb: Xin Zhao charges to an enemy, dealing damage to all enemies in the area and slowing them briefly.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Xin Zhao''' {{tip|dashes}} to the target enemy, dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} to all nearby units and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 30% for {{fd|0.5}} seconds.
'''Xin Zhao''' then gains {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for 5 seconds.
e1.name: Audacious Charge

riot.name: Crescent Guard
riot.description: Xin Zhao deals damage to nearby enemies based on their current Health and knocks non-challenged targets back. Xin Zhao is impervious to damage dealt by champions outside of the circle created.
riot.tooltip:
Xin Zhao unleashes a sweep around him that deals {{ totaldamage }} plus {{ percentcurrenthealthdamage*100 }}% of target's current Health in physical damage and knocks them back (max 600 vs monsters).

For {{ missiledefensebaseduration }} seconds after casting this ability, Xin Zhao has increased Awareness and will completely block damage from enemies that are far away. Xin Zhao's attacks and spell casts increase the duration of Awareness by {{ bonusdurationperswing }} seconds each.

The last champion hit by Xin Zhao's basic attacks or Audacious Charge is not knocked back.

r1.blurb: Xin Zhao deals damage to nearby enemies based on their current Health and knocks non-challenged targets back. Xin Zhao is impervious to damage dealt by champions outside of the circle created.
description: {{sbc|Passive - Challenge:}} The last enemy champion targeted by '''Xin Zhao's''' [[basic attack]]s or {{ai|Audacious Charge|Xin Zhao}} is ''{{ai|Challenge|Xin Zhao|Challenged}}'' for 3 seconds.

{{sbc|Active - Awareness:}} After {{fd|0.35}} seconds, '''Xin Zhao''' sweeps around him, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemies hit, capped at 600 {{as|(+ 100% '''bonus''' AD)}} against [[monster]]s, while also {{tip|airborne|knocking back}} all non-''{{ai|Challenge|Xin Zhao|Challenged}}'' enemies hit.

For the next 3 seconds, '''Xin Zhao''' is {{tip|invulnerability|invulnerable}} against enemy champions more than 450-units away from him. His [[basic attack]]s and other [[champion ability|spell casts]] extend the duration by {{fd|0.3}} seconds.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|75 to 275 3}} {{as|(+ 100% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 15% of target's '''current''' health)}}}}
r1.name: Crescent Guard
notes: *Pets, clones, traps, bombs, DoTs, and delayed-damage skills will not damage '''Xin Zhao''' if the enemy champion source is outside the circle when the damage applies.
*Enemy minions, towers, and jungle monsters will damage '''Xin Zhao''' even when they are outside  {{ais|Crescent Guard|Xin Zhao}} range.
*{{ai|Crescent Guard|Xin Zhao}} does not negate crowd control effects, it only negates the damage portion.
